name: Pigeon Pooper (Yashi)
description:
For the theme "You are the enemy" we developed this masterpiece of a game as a team.

While playing the pigeon Guru, your goal is to poop on as many people as you can in a certain timelimit!

The people are minding their business? Walking away into a shop?
Well, you don't care!

Have fun in this unique type of game and compare your highscore with your friends.

Pigeon Pooper is the game for young and old!



Controls:
Move: WASD / Left Joystick
Camera: Mouse / Right Joystick
Jump: Space / Left Trigger/Bumper/ Bottom Face Button
Poop: Left Mouse Click / Right Trigger/Bumper/ Right Face Button
Pause: ESC / Start Button



We hope you have a good time and enjoy our game!


Credits:

Godot Toon Shader - https://godotshaders.com/shader/toon/
Sounds - EpidemicSound, WeLoveIndies
